TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InputBinding extends System.Windows.Freezable implements class System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource
Public Class InputBinding Inherits Freezable Implements ICommandSource
public ref class InputBinding : System::Windows::Freezable, System::Windows::Input::ICommandSource

summary.span: 表示 和命令之间的绑定。

span.span: Represents a binding between an and a command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以指定用户输入的创建来调用命令。You can specify that user input invokes a command by creating a . 当用户执行指定的输入，设置为执行属性。When the user performs the specified input, the that is set to the property is executed. 你可以指定时通过在创建绑定定义的对象的命令，将调用， ，和属性。You can specify that the invokes a command that is defined on an object by creating a binding on the , , and properties. 这使你可以定义自定义命令并将其与用户输入。This enables you to define a custom command and associate it with user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅示例部分中的第二个示例。For more information, see the second example in the Examples section. 可以通过注册特定对象上或在类级别定义与。An can be defined on a specific object or at the class level by registering a with the . 类本身不支持 XAML 用法，因为它不公开公共默认构造函数 （没有默认构造函数，但它受保护）。The class itself does not support XAML usage because it does not expose a public default constructor (there is a default constructor, but it is protected). 但是，派生的类可以公开公共构造函数，因此可以在继承自派生类上设置属性与 XAML 用法。However, derived classes can expose a public constructor and therefore can set properties on the derived class that are inherited from with a XAML usage. 有两个现有-派生的类，可以在 XAML 中实例化并可以在 XAML 中设置属性是和。Two existing -derived classes that can be instantiated in XAML and can set properties in XAML are and . 中的典型属性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]编程，它一个或多个在 XAML 和采用中设置作为值的对象是属性。The typical property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] programming that is set in XAML and takes one or more objects as values is the property. ## XAML 对象元素用法XAML Object Element Usage \<*inputBindingDerivedClass…/*>\<*inputBindingDerivedClass…/*> ## XAML 值XAML Values `inputBindingDerivedClass` 派生的类，支持对象元素语法，如或。A derived class of that supports object element syntax, such as or . 请参阅“备注”。See Remarks. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用绑定到命令。The following example shows how to use a to bind a to the command. 当执行键笔势，则将调用打开命令。When the key gesture is performed, the Open command is invoked. [!code-xaml[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewXAMLKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#commandingoverviewxamlkeybinding)] 下面的示例演示如何将绑定到自定义命令对象。The following examples show how to bind a custom command to objects. 这些示例创建的应用程序使用户能够通过执行以下操作之一来更改背景色：These examples create an application that enables the user to change the background color by performing one of the following actions: - 单击的按钮。Clicking a button. - 按 CTRL + C。Pressing CTRL+C. - 右键单击(外部)。Right-clicking a (outside the ). 第一个示例创建一个名为类`SimpleDelegateCommand`。The first example creates a class named `SimpleDelegateCommand`. 此类接受委托，以便创建命令的对象可以定义命令能够执行时发生的操作。This class accepts a delegate so that the object creating the command can define the action that occurs when the command executes. `SimpleDelegateCommand` 此外定义，这些属性指定哪个键和鼠标输入时，将调用该命令。`SimpleDelegateCommand` also defines properties that specify what key and mouse input invokes the command. `GestureKey` 和`GestureModifier`指定键盘输入;`MouseGesture`指定鼠标输入。`GestureKey` and `GestureModifier` specify the keyboard input; `MouseGesture` specifies the mouse input. [!code-csharp[InputCommandBinding#DelegateCommand](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/inputcommandbinding/csharp/mainwindow.xaml.cs#delegatecommand)] [!code-vb[InputCommandBinding#DelegateCommand](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/inputcommandbinding/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#delegatecommand)] 下面的示例创建并初始化`ColorChangeCommand`，即`SimpleDelegateCommand`。The following example creates and initializes the `ColorChangeCommand`, which is a `SimpleDelegateCommand`. 该示例还定义该命令将调用并设置时执行的方法`GestureKey`， `GestureModifier`，和`MouseGesture`属性。The example also defines the method that executes when the command is invoked and sets the `GestureKey`, `GestureModifier`, and `MouseGesture` properties. 应用程序将调用`InitializeCommand`当程序开始时，如如下所示的构造函数的方法。An application would call the `InitializeCommand` method when the program begins, such as in the constructor of a . [!code-csharp[InputCommandBinding#InitializeCommand](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/inputcommandbinding/csharp/mainwindow.xaml.cs#initializecommand)] [!code-vb[InputCommandBinding#InitializeCommand](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/inputcommandbinding/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#initializecommand)] 最后，下面的示例创建用户界面。Finally, the following example creates the user interface. 该示例将添加和到包含和。The example adds a and a to a that contains a and a . 当用户选择中的项，他或她可以将背景的颜色更改为所选颜色。When the user selects an item in the , he or she can change the color of the background to the selected color. 在每个情况下，`CommandParameter`属性绑定到中的所选项目，和`Command`属性绑定到`ColorChangeCommand`。In each case, the `CommandParameter` property is bound to the selected item in the , and the `Command` property is bound to the `ColorChangeCommand`. ， ，和属性绑定到相应的属性`SimpleDelegateCommand`类。The , , and properties are bound to the corresponding properties on the `SimpleDelegateCommand` class. [!code-xaml[InputCommandBinding#UI](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/inputcommandbinding/csharp/mainwindow.xaml#ui)]

summary.span: 提供从 派生的类的基初始化。

span.span: Provides base initialization for classes derived from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不从技术上讲是一个抽象类，但默认构造函数是有意访问受保护。 is not technically an abstract class, but the default constructor is deliberately protected access. 这具有等效于将的"抽象"类的 XAML。This has the effect of making an "abstract" class for XAML. 中的现有属性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]具有预期类型的对象的 XAML 用法，但不是能指定在 XAML 中的实例。There are existing properties in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] that have XAML usages that expect objects of type , but you cannot specify an instance in XAML. 作为替代，你可以指定一个特定于设备的作为值，例如派生类或。Instead, you can specify one of the device-specific derived classes as values, for instance or .

para.span: 如果你实现一个自定义支持 XAML 用法、 用作基初始化中使用此构造函数。

span.span: If you implement a custom that supports a XAML usage, use this constructor for base initialization.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Input.ICommand command, class System.Windows.Input.InputGesture gesture) cil managed

param.name: command
param.span: 要与 gesture 关联的命令。

param.span: 要与 command 关联的输入笔势。

summary.span: 用指定的命令和输入笔势初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified command and input gesture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你是软件开发人员使用的绑定类的现有输入，你通常将不使用此构造函数，即使你正在定义的自定义命令。If you are a software developer using existing input binding classes, you generally will not use this constructor, even if you are defining custom commands. 相反，你将使用派生类的构造函数 (和)，或你将使用此构造函数作为自定义类的基实例化。Instead, you will either use constructors of derived classes ( and ), or you will use this constructor as the base instantiation of a custom class. 尽管类原则上，在实践中您必须选择将表示输入的绑定哪些设备支持不同的输入的设备。Although the class supports different input devices in principle, in practice you must choose which device the input binding will represent. 仅可以设置仅一个上输入的绑定和笔势值是特定于设备的。You only can set only one value on the input binding, and gestures are device-specific. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此构造函数将关联与。The following example shows how to use this constructor to associate a with a . [!code-csharp[commandlibrarysnippets#InputBindingAddingComand](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandLibrarySnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#inputbindingaddingcomand)] [!code-vb[commandlibrarysnippets#InputBindingAddingComand](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandLibrarySnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#inputbindingaddingcomand)]

span.span: Gets or sets the associated with this input binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类不支持 XAML 用法，因为它不公开公共默认构造函数 （它具有默认构造函数，但它受保护）。The class does not support XAML usage because it does not expose a public default constructor (it has a default constructor, but it is protected). 但是，派生的类可以公开公共构造函数，因此，可以使用的属性，从继承。However, derived classes can expose a public constructor and therefore, can use properties that are inherited from . 有两个现有派生的类可以在 XAML 中实例化，可以设置与 XAML 用法的属性是和。Two existing derived classes that can be instantiated in XAML and can set properties with XAML usages are and . 引用使某些预先存在的类型转换器实现以字符串形式指定值。 references a type converter that enables certain preexisting implementations to specify values in the form of a string. 此类型转换行为设置此属性的属性值窗体。This type conversion behavior sets the attribute value form of this property. 你也可以将绑定， ，和属性设置为对象上定义。You can also bind the , , and properties to an that is defined on an object. 这使你可以定义自定义命令并将其与用户输入。This enables you to define a custom command and associate it with user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的第二个示例。For more information, see the second example in . ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage <`inputBindingDerivedClass` `Command`=""/><`inputBindingDerivedClass` `Command`=""/> ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `inputBindingDerivedClass` 派生的类，支持对象元素语法，如或。A derived class of that supports object element syntax, such as or . 请参阅“备注”。See Remarks. `iCommandImplementation` 对象实现支持对象元素语法 （具有公共默认构造函数）。An object implementation of that supports object element syntax (has a public default constructor). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用绑定到命令。The following example shows how to use a to bind a to the command. 当执行键笔势，则将调用打开命令。When the key gesture is performed, the Open command is invoked. [!code-xaml[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewXAMLKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#commandingoverviewxamlkeybinding)] [!code-csharp[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#commandingoverviewkeybinding)] [!code-vb[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#commandingoverviewkeybinding)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ CommandParameter { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置特定命令的命令特定数据。

span.span: Gets or sets the command-specific data for a particular command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于将特定的信息传递给命令中，执行时。The property is used to pass specific information to the command when it is executed. 由该命令定义的数据类型。The type of the data is defined by the command. 很多命令不希望命令参数;对于这些命令，将忽略传递任何命令参数。Many commands do not expect command parameters; for these commands, any command parameters passed will be ignored. 如果与关联的输入的绑定命令是、的输入绑定传递到处理程序通过和时处理此命令的事件数据。If the command that an input binding is associated with is a , the of the input binding is passed to the handlers through the and the event data when the command is processed. 数据类型和用途的命令参数为每个命令以不同方式定义，并且可以是`null`。The data type and purpose of the command parameter are defined differently for each command and can be `null`. 你可以将绑定， ，和属性设置为对象上定义。You can bind the , , and properties to an that is defined on an object. 这使你可以定义自定义命令并将其与用户输入。This enables you to define a custom command and associate it with user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的第二个示例。For more information, see the second example in . 类不支持 XAML 用法，因为它不公开公共默认构造函数 （它具有默认构造函数，但它受保护）。The class does not support XAML usage because it does not expose a public default constructor (it has a default constructor, but it is protected). 但是，派生的类可以公开公共构造函数，因此，可以设置从继承的属性与 XAML 用法。However, derived classes can expose a public constructor and therefore, can set properties that are inherited from with XAML usage. 有两个现有派生的类，可以在 XAML 中实例化并可以在 XAML 中设置属性是和。Two existing derived classes that can be instantiated in XAML and can set properties in XAML are and . ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `inputBindingDerivedClass` 派生的类，支持对象元素语法，如或。A derived class of that supports object element syntax, such as or . 请参阅“备注”。See Remarks. `commandParameterString` 一个字符串，由特定的命令处理。A string that is processed by a particular command. 字符串是用于命令参数，因为它们可以轻松地设置在 XAML 中的公共类型。Strings are the common type used for command parameters because they can be easily set in XAML. 预期的字符串格式以及其用途，请参阅与关联的输入的绑定的特定命令的文档。For the expected string format and its purpose, see the documentation for the particular command that the input binding is associated with. 很多命令不需要参数。Many commands do not expect parameters. `commandParameterObject` 由特定命令处理的对象。An object that is processed by a particular command. 所有现有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]命令使用字符串。All existing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] commands use strings. 因此，此属性元素语法仅适用于自定义命令方案。Therefore, this property element syntax is only relevant for custom command scenarios. 为了支持此语法`commandParameterObject`对象还必须支持对象元素语法 （必须具有公共默认构造函数）。In order to support this syntax, the `commandParameterObject` object must also support object element syntax (must have a public default constructor).

summary.span: 获取或设置命令的目标元素。

span.span: Gets or sets the target element of the command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命令系统中，Windows Presentation Foundation 中属性对象是适用时，才是。In the Windows Presentation Foundation commanding system, the property on an object is applicable only when the is a . 如果上设置和相应的命令不是，命令目标将被忽略。If the is set on an and the corresponding command is not a , the command target is ignored. 如果用于，命令目标是在其上的对象和引发事件。When used with a , the command target is the object on which the and events are raised. 如果未设置属性，则具有键盘焦点的元素使用作为目标。If the property is not set, the element with keyboard focus is used as the target. 类本身不支持 XAML 用法中，因为它不公开公共默认构造函数 （没有默认构造函数，但它受保护）。The class itself does not support XAML usage, because it does not expose a public default constructor (there is a default constructor, but it is protected). 但是，派生的类可以公开公共构造函数，因此可以设置从继承的属性与 XAML 用法。However, derived classes can expose a public constructor and therefore can set properties that are inherited from with a XAML usage. 有两个现有派生的类，可以在 XAML 中实例化并可以在 XAML 中设置属性是和。Two existing derived classes that can be instantiated in XAML and can set properties in XAML are and . ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `inputBindingDerivedClass` 派生的类，支持对象元素语法，如或。A derived class of that supports object element syntax, such as or . 请参阅“备注”。See Remarks. `bindingToTarget` 一个字符串，使用绑定语法可以返回对现有的对象引用的类型名称的元素。A string that uses a type of binding syntax that can return an object reference to an existing named element. 请参阅“备注”。See Remarks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 输入的笔势是调用该命令的操作。The input gesture is the action that invokes the command. 示例中的输入笔势[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]是和。Examples of input gestures in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] are and . A既有和一组。A is a combination of a and a set of . A既有和一组。A is a combination of a and a set of . 类本身不支持 XAML 用法中，因为它不公开公共默认构造函数 （没有默认构造函数，但它受保护）。The class itself does not support XAML usage, because it does not expose a public default constructor (there is a default constructor, but it is protected). 但是，派生的类可以公开公共构造函数，因此可以设置从继承的属性与 XAML 用法。However, derived classes can expose a public constructor and thus can set properties that are inherited from with a XAML usage. 有两个现有派生的类，可以在 XAML 中实例化并可以在 XAML 中设置属性是和。Two existing derived classes that can be instantiated in XAML and can set properties in XAML are and . ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage < `Gesture`=""/>< `Gesture`=""/> \- 或 -\- or - < `Gesture`=""/>< `Gesture`=""/> \- 或 -\- or - <`inputBindingDerivedClass` `Gesture`=""/><`inputBindingDerivedClass` `Gesture`=""/> ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `inputBindingDerivedClass` 派生的类，支持对象元素语法，如或。A derived class of that supports object element syntax, such as or . 请参阅“备注”。See Remarks. `inputGestureImplementation` 自定义派生的类支持对象元素语法。A custom derived class of that supports object element syntax. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用绑定到。The following example shows how to use a to bind a to a . 当按下 ALT + L，调用命令。When the ALT+L is pressed, the command is invoked. [!code-xaml[commandlibrarysnippets#KeyBindingWithKeyAndModifiersXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandLibrarySnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#keybindingwithkeyandmodifiersxaml)] [!code-csharp[commandlibrarysnippets#KeyBindingWithKeyAndModifiers](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandLibrarySnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#keybindingwithkeyandmodifiers)] [!code-vb[commandlibrarysnippets#KeyBindingWithKeyAndModifiers](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandLibrarySnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#keybindingwithkeyandmodifiers)]

span.span: If the object has animated dependency properties, their current animated values are copied.
